page.title: 11Children's Games
page.content:
These are some of the most popular games on our estate.{Cannon}is one of the easiest. You need a can, a ball and some sticks.{Floorball}is another easy game, you need three people on each team and you have two benches and have to try to score a goal using your hands.{Bulldog}is quite a simple game, first you need a group of people. You take one person out and he is the
catcher. In{TV Initials}you need at least four people, one person takes it and says the initials of a programme and the others have to try and guess it. The{Video Computer Pack}is for all the family.{Snooker}is not an easy game, you need two people, some cues, a table and some coloured balls. The most popular of all games is{Football, mostly lads play this game.
